name: BLoBi
description:
BLoBi is more of a experimental use of a Shader Forge for uni. 

You play as a spirit life form in a barren alien landscape. Giving birth to life forms is a part of your duty to revive this land but in trade you sacrifice yourself to create a beautiful landscape. There specific locations you have to go to in order to give life back to the land. 

The sense of Self Sacrifice is the essence of the game that I want to invoke towards the player. 

Note: Best played with xbox/gamepad controller
